abstract: A museum replicating a lab in the Research Tower at S. C. Johnson’s headquarters in Racine, Wis., is opening as part of an eight-year, $30 million restoration project.
snippet: A museum replicating a lab in the Research Tower at S. C. Johnson’s headquarters in Racine, Wis., is opening as part of an eight-year, $30 million restoration project.
lead_paragraph: RACINE, Wis. — If anything is eternal in real estate, it is the dance of desire that exists between chief executives and their architects.

headline.main: A Corporate Paean to Frank Lloyd Wright
headline.print_headline: A Corporate Paean to Frank Lloyd Wright
